DOC.brief_summary: This study determine titration regimen SBR759 compare sevelamer HCl lower serum phosphate level Asian Chronic Kidney Disease patient hemodialysis
DOC.brief_title: Optimal Titration Regimen SBR759 Lowering Serum Phosphate Levels Asian Chronic Kidney Disease Patients Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Men woman least 18 year old 20 year old Japan . Stable maintenance hemodialysis 3 time per week . Controlled serum phosphate phosphatebinder therapy . Serum phosphate level > 6.0 mg/dL ( > 1.9 mmol/L ) prior study treatment initiation . Exclusion criterion Peritoneal dialysis nonconventional hemodialysis technique . Parathyroidectomy transplant schedule study . Uncontrolled hyperparathyroidism History hemochromatosis ferritin > 800 Âµg/L . Clinically significant GI disorder Unstable medical condition Chronic Kidney Disease . Treated sevelamer HCl monotherapy SBR759 . Treated oral iron . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
